info.+content: "Happy Happy Dance" (ハッピー2ダンス) by YASU
株式会社エイケン オフィシャルサイト | 作品紹介

title.+content: GAHATSU ! BOKU no tou-chan AGODEKA shunin
JAAN ! shinnyuushain wa okaa-sama to issho ni !
PAPA kocchi muite ! hitoribocchi no junko-chan
UKIUKI ensoku ! ashita tenki ni naa-re
CHAO ! youki na okyakusama wa ITARIA jin !!
GANBARE kaa-chan ! ISHIDAI tsuri ni chousen da !
DOUN to hanabi da yakitori saikou
natsu da umi da mizugi no PUREZENTO
makoto no sumou taikai to KATSU ka obaa-chan dairen'ai
miyuki no SANTA wa oshiirere kara ?
tou-chan ga KAZE de taoreta hi
haru da ! shoubu da ! MARASON taikai
minna de hoshi ni negai wo !
natsu no kawara de dai PAATII
FUREEFUREE araiwa ikka ! aki no daiun dou kai mezase gyakuten dai yuushou !!
miyuki no kingyo to o-sanpo ( HAATOMAAKU )
aki no hi wa fuufu de DEETO
ooki na yume ! ojii-chan no KURISUMASUTSURII !!
akogare no onna ( hito ) wa juudou shodan
shuku ! mirai no mei KOKKU tanjou
mitsugu wa fukou na hoshi no shita
tanaka ryuu ! KATSU donburi no tabekata
kettou ! hakata no yoru wa fukete
